s: Coalmine Records has sought to provide the world with that classic Hip-Hop sound from its humble headquarters in the heart of Brooklyn since 2005. If you’re craving honest, inspiring Hip Hop, be sure to dig into our ever-expanding music catalog. Can you dig it?
